column4: have a look at help.ubuntu.com and click on the "lifesaver" icon on your top panel

using System Administration Synaptic Package Management
put it all on one line - makes it easy to understand what you are trying to do, don't break it up into little bits (bytes ;))
now if I had a player I would know how to do it :)P
Hi again...its a Lexmark Oprata E310 black and white laser printer
do this, from the menu, System Administration Printing, then it should be easy enough to say local printer and work from there

I see it there are a lot of them, you are running 5.10 I take it
your printer is there it just needs to be scrolled down to it, its a long way off
